if GF_SavedVariables.mainframestatus == 2 then GF_SavedVariables.mainframestatus = 0 GF_ToggleMainFrame(3) else if GF_SavedVariables.mainframestatus == 0 then local _,_,_,xpos, ypos = GF_MainFrame:GetPoint() GF_SavedVariables.MainFrameXPos = xpos GF_SavedVariables.MainFrameYPos = ypos end GF_SavedVariables.mainframestatus = 2 GF_ToggleMainFrame(3) end

Scripts.OnEditFocusGained: if GF_LFGDescriptionEditBoxHasFocus[2] + .005 < GetTime() then GF_LFGDescriptionEditBoxHasFocus = {true,GetTime()} end this:HighlightText(string.len(this:GetText())+1)
Scripts.OnEditFocusLost: if GF_LFGDescriptionEditBoxHasFocus[2] + .005 < GetTime() then GF_LFGDescriptionEditBoxHasFocus = {nil,GetTime()} end GF_PerCharVariables.searchlfgtext = GF_LFGDescriptionEditBox:GetText() this:HighlightText(string.len(this:GetText())+1) if GF_PerCharVariables.searchlfgtext ~= "" then GF_LFGDescriptionClearButton:Show() else GF_LFGDescriptionClearButton:Hide() GF_UpdateQueueLFTButton() end
Scripts.OnTabPressed: GF_PerCharVariables.searchlfgtext = GF_LFGDescriptionEditBox:GetText() this:ClearFocus() this:HighlightText(string.len(this:GetText())+1) if GF_PerCharVariables.searchlfgtext ~= "" then GF_LFGDescriptionClearButton:Show() else GF_LFGDescriptionClearButton:Hide() GF_UpdateQueueLFTButton() end
Scripts.OnEnterPressed: GF_PerCharVariables.searchlfgtext = GF_LFGDescriptionEditBox:GetText() this:ClearFocus() this:HighlightText(string.len(this:GetText())+1) if GF_PerCharVariables.searchlfgtext ~= "" then GF_LFGDescriptionClearButton:Show() else GF_LFGDescriptionClearButton:Hide() GF_UpdateQueueLFTButton() end
Scripts.OnEscapePressed: GF_PerCharVariables.searchlfgtext = GF_LFGDescriptionEditBox:GetText() this:ClearFocus() this:HighlightText(string.len(this:GetText())+1) if GF_PerCharVariables.searchlfgtext ~= "" then GF_LFGDescriptionClearButton:Show() else GF_LFGDescriptionClearButton:Hide() GF_UpdateQueueLFTButton() end

Scripts.OnClick: GF_PerCharVariables.searchlfgtext = "" GF_LFGDescriptionEditBox:SetText("") GF_LFGDescriptionClearButton:Hide() if GF_AutoAnnounceTimer then GF_TurnOffAnnounce(GF_AUTO_ANNOUNCE_TURNED_OFF) end GF_UpdateQueueLFTButton()

Scripts.OnValueChanged: if this:GetValue() > 10 then GF_SavedVariables.announcetimer = (this:GetValue()-10)*300 + 600 getglobal(this:GetName().."Label"):SetText((GF_SavedVariables.announcetimer/60).." -"..GF_MINUTES) else GF_SavedVariables.announcetimer = this:GetValue()*60 getglobal(this:GetName().."Label"):SetText((GF_SavedVariables.announcetimer/60).." -"..GF_MINUTES) end if GF_AutoAnnounceTimer then GF_AnnounceToLFGButton:SetText(GF_ANNOUNCE_STOP_ANNOUNCE.."-"..GF_SavedVariables.announcetimer - GF_AutoAnnounceTimer) end

Scripts.OnClick: if GF_ResultsListOffset > 0 then GF_ResultsListOffset = GF_ResultsListOffset - GF_ResultsListOffsetSize GF_UpdateResults() end
if getn(GF_FilteredResultsList) >GF_ResultsListOffset + GF_ResultsListOffsetSize then GF_ResultsListOffset = GF_ResultsListOffset + GF_ResultsListOffsetSize GF_UpdateResults() end
if GF_BlackListOffset >0 then GF_BlackListOffset = GF_BlackListOffset - 20 GF_UpdateBlackListItems() end
if getn(GF_BlackList[GF_RealmName]) >GF_BlackListOffset + 20 then GF_BlackListOffset = GF_BlackListOffset + 20 GF_UpdateBlackListItems() end
GF_AddPlayerFrame:Show()
PlaySound("igChatBottom") this:GetParent():ScrollToBottom()
if (this:GetButtonState() == "PUSHED") then this.clickDelay = MESSAGE_SCROLLBUTTON_INITIAL_DELAY else PlaySound("igChatScrollDown") this:GetParent():ScrollDown() end
if (this:GetButtonState() == "PUSHED") then this.clickDelay = MESSAGE_SCROLLBUTTON_INITIAL_DELAY else PlaySound("igChatScrollUp") this:GetParent():ScrollUp() end

Scripts.OnMouseWheel: if arg1 == 1 then this:ScrollUp() this:ScrollUp() this:ScrollUp() else this:ScrollDown() this:ScrollDown() this:ScrollDown() end

Scripts.OnClick: GF_SavedVariables.logshowgroup = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logshowgroup then GF_LogFilters[1] = true GF_LogFilters[2] = true else GF_LogFilters[1] = nil GF_LogFilters[2] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.logshowfiltered = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logshowfiltered then GF_LogFilters[3] = true else GF_LogFilters[3] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.logshowchat = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logshowchat then GF_LogFilters[5] = true else GF_LogFilters[5] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.logshowtrades = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logshowtrades then GF_LogFilters[9] = true else GF_LogFilters[9] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.logshowguilds = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logshowguilds then GF_LogFilters[8] = true else GF_LogFilters[8] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.logshowloot = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logshowloot then GF_LogFilters[6] = true else GF_LogFilters[6] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.logshowspam = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logshowspam then GF_LogFilters[7] = true else GF_LogFilters[7] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.logshowblacklist = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logshowblacklist then GF_LogFilters[10] = true else GF_LogFilters[10] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.logshowbelowlevel = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logshowbelowlevel then GF_LogFilters[11] = true else GF_LogFilters[11] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

Scripts.OnLeave: if not GetMouseFocus() or not GetMouseFocus():GetName() or not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "GF_LogFilter") then GF_LogFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() end

Scripts.OnClick: GF_SavedVariables.logchannels = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logchannels then GF_LogFilters["CHANNEL"] = true else GF_LogFilters["CHANNEL"] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.logparty = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logparty then GF_LogFilters["PARTY"] = true GF_LogFilters["RAID"] = true GF_LogFilters["RAID_LEADER"] = true GF_LogFilters["RAID_WARNING"] = true GF_LogFilters["BATTLEGROUND"] = true GF_LogFilters["BATTLEGROUND_LEADER"] = true else GF_LogFilters["PARTY"] = nil GF_LogFilters["RAID"] = nil GF_LogFilters["RAID_LEADER"] = nil GF_LogFilters["RAID_WARNING"] = nil GF_LogFilters["BATTLEGROUND"] = nil GF_LogFilters["BATTLEGROUND_LEADER"] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.logguild = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logguild then GF_LogFilters["GUILD"] = true GF_LogFilters["OFFICER"] = true else GF_LogFilters["GUILD"] = nil GF_LogFilters["OFFICER"] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.logwhisper = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logwhisper then GF_LogFilters["WHISPER"] = true GF_LogFilters["WHISPER_INFORM"] = true else GF_LogFilters["WHISPER"] = nil GF_LogFilters["WHISPER_INFORM"] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.logsay = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logsay then GF_LogFilters["SAY"] = true else GF_LogFilters["SAY"] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.logyell = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logyell then GF_LogFilters["YELL"] = true else GF_LogFilters["YELL"] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.loghardcore = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.loghardcore then GF_LogFilters["HARDCORE"] = true GF_LogFilters["SYSTEM"] = true else GF_LogFilters["HARDCORE"] = nil GF_LogFilters["SYSTEM"] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

Scripts.OnLeave: if not GetMouseFocus() or not GetMouseFocus():GetName() or not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "GF_LogChannelFilter") then GF_LogChannelFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() end

Scripts.OnClick: GF_LogFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() GF_LogChannelFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() if not GF_LogChannelName:IsShown() then GF_ButtonListFunctions(gsub(this:GetName(),"%d","").."Show") else GF_LogChannelName:Hide() end

if not GetMouseFocus() or not GetMouseFocus():GetName() or not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "LogChannelName") then GF_LogChannelName:Hide() end

Scripts.OnClick: if GF_WhisperLogOffset > 0 then GF_WhisperLogOffset = GF_WhisperLogOffset - 18 if GF_SavedVariables.showwhisperlogs == 1 then GF_WhisperHistoryUpdateFrame() elseif GF_SavedVariables.showwhisperlogs == 2 then GF_GroupHistoryUpdateFrame() end end

if GF_SavedVariables.showwhisperlogs == 1 and getn(GF_WhisperLogData[GF_RealmName]) > GF_WhisperLogOffset + 19 then GF_WhisperLogOffset = GF_WhisperLogOffset + 18 GF_WhisperHistoryUpdateFrame() elseif GF_SavedVariables.showwhisperlogs == 2 and getn(GF_GroupHistory[GF_RealmName]) > GF_WhisperLogOffset + 19 then GF_WhisperLogOffset = GF_WhisperLogOffset + 18 GF_GroupHistoryUpdateFrame() end

if GF_SavedVariables.showwhisperlogs == 1 then GF_SavedVariables.showwhisperlogs = false else GF_SavedVariables.showwhisperlogs = 1 GF_WhisperLogOffset = 0 GF_WhisperHistoryUpdateFrame() end GF_UpdateWhisperFrame()

if GF_SavedVariables.showwhisperlogs == 2 then GF_SavedVariables.showwhisperlogs = false else GF_SavedVariables.showwhisperlogs = 2 GF_WhisperLogOffset = 0 GF_GroupHistoryUpdateFrame() end GF_UpdateWhisperFrame()

if GF_ConvertMessagesToLinks then GF_ConvertMessagesToLinks = nil GF_ConvertLogMessagesToURL:SetText(GF_LOG_CONVERT_URL) GF_ConvertLogMessagesToURL:UnlockHighlight() else GF_ConvertMessagesToLinks = true GF_ConvertLogMessagesToURL:SetText(GF_LOG_RESET_MESSAGES) GF_ConvertLogMessagesToURL:LockHighlight() end for i=GF_Log:GetCurrentScroll(),1000 do if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() elseif GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 1 then GF_WhisperHistoryDisplayLog("Guild") else GF_WhisperHistoryDisplayLog(getglobal("GF_WhisperHistoryButton"..GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID):GetText()) end for j=1, i do GF_Log:ScrollUp() end break end

Scripts.OnLeave: GameTooltip:Hide()

Scripts.OnClick: GF_BlockList:Hide() if not GF_GroupChannelName:IsShown() then GF_ButtonListFunctions(gsub(this:GetName(),"%d","").."Show") else GF_GroupChannelName:Hide() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if not GetMouseFocus() or not GetMouseFocus():GetName() or not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "GroupChannelName") then GF_GroupChannelName:Hide() end
if not GetMouseFocus() or not GetMouseFocus():GetName() or not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "GroupChannelName") then GF_GroupChannelName:Hide() end

Scripts.OnClick: GF_SavedVariables.joinworld = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.joinworld then GF_JoinWorld() else LeaveChannelByName(GF_GroupChannelEditBox:GetText()) end

Scripts.OnLeave: GameTooltip:Hide()
Scripts.OnEnterPressed: if string.len(this:GetText()) > 0 then for i=1,getn(GF_SavedVariables.blocklist) do if string.lower(GF_SavedVariables.blocklist[i]) == string.lower(this:GetText()) then table.remove(GF_BUTTONS_LIST["BlockList"],i) table.remove(GF_SavedVariables.blocklist,i) break end if i > 59 then table.remove(GF_BUTTONS_LIST["BlockList"],60) table.remove(GF_SavedVariables.blocklist,60) end end table.insert(GF_BUTTONS_LIST["BlockList"],1,{this:GetText()}) table.insert(GF_SavedVariables.blocklist,1,this:GetText()) GF_WORD_BLOCK_LIST[GF_FormatBlockListWords(this:GetText(),true)] = true this:SetText("") this:HighlightText(string.len(this:GetText())+1) end this:ClearFocus()

Scripts.OnClick: if string.len(GF_BlockListEditBox:GetText()) > 0 then for i=1,getn(GF_SavedVariables.blocklist) do if string.lower(GF_SavedVariables.blocklist[i]) == string.lower(GF_BlockListEditBox:GetText()) then table.remove(GF_BUTTONS_LIST["BlockList"],i) table.remove(GF_SavedVariables.blocklist,i) break end if i > 59 then table.remove(GF_BUTTONS_LIST["BlockList"],60) table.remove(GF_SavedVariables.blocklist,60) end end table.insert(GF_BUTTONS_LIST["BlockList"],1,{GF_BlockListEditBox:GetText()}) table.insert(GF_SavedVariables.blocklist,1,GF_BlockListEditBox:GetText()) GF_WORD_BLOCK_LIST[GF_FormatBlockListWords(GF_BlockListEditBox:GetText(),true)] = true GF_BlockListEditBox:SetText("") GF_BlockListEditBox:HighlightText(string.len(GF_BlockListEditBox:GetText())+1) end GF_BlockListEditBox:ClearFocus()
GF_GroupChannelName:Hide() if not GF_BlockList:IsShown() then GF_ButtonListFunctions(gsub(this:GetName(),"%d","").."Show") else GF_BlockList:Hide() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if not GetMouseFocus() or not GetMouseFocus():GetName() or not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "BlockList") then GF_BlockList:Hide() end
if not GetMouseFocus() or not GetMouseFocus():GetName() or not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "BlockList") then GF_BlockList:Hide() end

Scripts.OnValueChanged: if this:GetValue() > 21 then GF_SavedVariables.spamfilterduration = (this:GetValue()-21)*300 + 600 getglobal(this:GetName().."Label"):SetText((GF_SavedVariables.spamfilterduration/60)..GF_MINUTES) elseif this:GetValue() > 12 then GF_SavedVariables.spamfilterduration = (this:GetValue()-11)*60 getglobal(this:GetName().."Label"):SetText((GF_SavedVariables.spamfilterduration/60)..GF_MINUTES) elseif this:GetValue() == 12 then GF_SavedVariables.spamfilterduration = 60 getglobal(this:GetName().."Label"):SetText((GF_SavedVariables.spamfilterduration/60)..GF_MIN) else GF_SavedVariables.spamfilterduration = this:GetValue()*5 getglobal(this:GetName().."Label"):SetText(GF_SavedVariables.spamfilterduration..GF_SECONDS) end

Scripts.OnClick: GF_SavedVariables.systemfilter = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.systemfilter then HELP_TEXT_SIMPLE = nil else HELP_TEXT_SIMPLE = GF_HELP_TEXT_SIMPLE end
GF_SavedVariables.showformattedchat = this:GetChecked()
GF_SavedVariables.alwaysshowguild = this:GetChecked()
if not GF_FontName:IsShown() then GF_ButtonListFunctions(gsub(this:GetName(),"%d","").."Show") else GF_FontName:Hide() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if not GetMouseFocus() or not GetMouseFocus():GetName() or not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "FontName") then GF_FontName:Hide() end
if not GetMouseFocus() or not GetMouseFocus():GetName() or not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "FontName") then GF_FontName:Hide() end

Scripts.OnClick: GF_SavedVariables.spamfilter = this:GetChecked() if not GF_SavedVariables.spamfilter then GF_AutomaticBlacklistCheckButton:SetChecked(false) GF_SavedVariables.autoblacklist = false end
GF_SavedVariables.autoblacklist = this:GetChecked()
if not GF_AutoBlacklistDropdownMenu:IsShown() then GF_AutoBlacklistDropdownMenu:Show() else GF_AutoBlacklistDropdownMenu:Hide() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if not GetMouseFocus() or not GetMouseFocus():GetName() or not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "AutoBlacklist") then GF_AutoBlacklistDropdownMenu:Hide() end

Scripts.OnClick: GF_SavedVariables.blacklisttrades = this:GetChecked()
GF_SavedVariables.blacklistguild = this:GetChecked()
GF_SavedVariables.blacklistchat = this:GetChecked()
GF_SavedVariables.blacklistforeign = this:GetChecked()

Scripts.OnLeave: if not GetMouseFocus() or not GetMouseFocus():GetName() or not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "AutoBlacklist") then GF_AutoBlacklistDropdownMenu:Hide() end

Scripts.OnValueChanged: if this:GetValue() > 10 then GF_SavedVariables.showgroupsnewonlytime = (this:GetValue()-10)*5 + 10 getglobal(this:GetName().."Label"):SetText(GF_SavedVariables.showgroupsnewonlytime..GF_MINUTES) else GF_SavedVariables.showgroupsnewonlytime = this:GetValue() getglobal(this:GetName().."Label"):SetText(GF_SavedVariables.showgroupsnewonlytime..GF_MINUTES) end

Scripts.OnClick: GF_MainFrame:SetScale(GF_SavedVariables.MainFrameUIScale)
GF_SavedVariables.squareminimap = this:GetChecked() GF_MoveMinimapIcon()

GF_SavedVariables.iconpriority = this:GetChecked() GF_SetPFUIAddonButtons() if GF_SavedVariables.iconpriority then if pfMinimap then GF_RelevelMinimapIcons(pfMinimap) else GF_RelevelMinimapIcons(Minimap) end end
GF_SavedVariables.questmod = this:GetChecked()
GF_SavedVariables.purgepfdb = this:GetChecked()
GF_SavedVariables.usefriendslist = this:GetChecked()
GF_SavedVariables.clickcombos = this:GetChecked()
GF_ResetAllSettingsDialog:Show()
GF_UrlCopyFrame:Hide()
GF_EditPlayerNoteFrame:Hide()
GF_PlayerNotes[GF_RealmName][GF_EditPlayerNoteFrameTitleLabel:GetText()] = GF_EditPlayerNoteFrameEditBox:GetText() GF_UpdateResults() GF_EditPlayerNoteFrame:Hide()
GF_PlayerNotes[GF_RealmName][GF_EditPlayerNoteFrameTitleLabel:GetText()] = "" GF_UpdateResults() GF_EditPlayerNoteFrame:Hide()

Scripts.OnHide:
GF_LFGSize:Hide() GF_LFGLFM:Hide() GF_LFGDungeon:Hide() GF_LFGRaid:Hide() GF_LFGRole:Hide() GF_GetWhoClass:Hide() GF_SearchList:Hide() GF_GetWhoFrame:Hide() GF_LFGFrame:Hide() GF_MessageFrame:Hide() GF_LogFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() GF_LogChannelFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() GF_LogChannelName:Hide() GF_GroupFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() GF_ChatFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() GF_LFGHardCoreDropdown:Hide() GF_GroupChannelName:Hide() GF_FontName:Hide() GF_BlockList:Hide() GF_AutoBlacklistDropdownMenu:Hide()
GF_SavedVariables.mainframeishidden = true GF_SavedVariables.mainframestatus = 0 if pfUI and pfUI.chat and pfUI.chat.urlcopy then pfUI.chat.urlcopy:SetWidth(270) pfUI.chat.urlcopy.text:SetWidth(250) end
